scripts.sequelize:init: npm run sequelize:init:migrations && npm run sequelize:init:models
scripts.db:init: npm run db:drop && npm run db:create
scripts.models:init: npm run models:create:user && npm run models:create:gift && npm run models:create:order
scripts.start: npm run db:drop && npm run db:create && npm run db:migrate && node index.js
scripts.init:project: npm run clear:project && npm run sequelize:init && npm run models:init
scripts.clear:project: shx rm -rf migrations models && shx echo Project Cleared
